name: israel
text: A comment left by israel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sid, GunsOfRay, Sock)

name: carlyle
text: Someone is finally taking a stand.

name: sargasm
text: This one was a little too intense for me.  That last panel is just such an amalgam of concepts, I had to reread the strip.

name: shmuckeles
text: I hear ya man, that is some pretty intense lingo like you wouldn't ever want try to translate it into Chinese

name: jdhenry105
text: A comment left by jdhenry105 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TheLoneliestMonkey, woodenteeth, aerylor, AtlanticCity, Rakadin)

name: soticoto
text: It was a trap and you walked right into it.

name: cheeks_jd
text: I dunno, jdhenry105 makes it seem pretty easy.

name: cailetshadow
text: I speak some Chinese and I really would not know where to begin. It would probably turn out a lot like Onstad's German comic days.

name: nikopol
text: My culture is beautiful, but it also has certain rules.

name: professorhazard
text: Your culture is against hoochie mamas.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Hoochie mother want-bling always match small counter, dogg. Ji said the center of boulevards to caution the mathematics.

name: apocowarg
text: purchasing knock-off designer items for hoochie mamas wil result in unprotected sex with said hoochie mamas. ratio 1:1. TIGHT MATH.

name: dusty
text: This also postulates that the hoochie mama impregnation rate is almost %100, or close enough that multiple births make up the discrepancy.

name: shinkusan
text: Yeah I was way confused until I noticed the "-" between wanna and bling.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Connellingus, _cheesekayke, pitseleh)

name: mountaindewtab
text: tight math is the only acceptable math

name: dueledge
text: dogg that math be TIGHT

name: dougthehead
text: Anyone else think it's weird that Ray is telling Beef to get Molly hoochie mama wanna-bling?  I always thought Ray had a higher opinion of Molly than that.

name: bixschmix
text: Maybe it's his "Ray way" of saying that he'd like to see some little RBs running around underfoot.

name: semiquaver
text: He'd like to see a little Ar-by's on his damn table is what he'd like to see

name: lucid
text:
That's why this one never sat right with me. First read through I thought there must be some other way to read it than Ray talking about how fake Tiffany gets a man laid.

I don't think he means anything against Molly and there are times when Ray being totally inappropriate is a joke in itself, but that isn't the joke here. Instead I'm constantly left with this feeling that Onstad was throwing it all away for "hoochie mama wanna-bling", and I don't think that's worth it.

name: tagrineth
text: This strip should be rated higher based on "well I guess we can pull out this dresser drawer that can be a crib" alone.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Ray's dialogue in panel 2 was like exactly my dad's thinking when it came to buying my mum's Christmas present this year.

And it fucking worked.

name: achilleselbow
text: Congratulations on your new  <strike>turd</strike>  little brother/sister!

name: heccibiggs
text: Joke's on you! My mum had a historectomy several years ago.

name: scraggg
text: That would make the joke on your phantom siblings.

name: tekende
text: I cannot for the life of me imagine any other circumstance under which these two sentences would be said together.

name: atmus
text: I guess your mom won't need a longer car then, since your dad can't give her babies from his wiener.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
i chubbed this whole thread. you each get a pretend high 5 from me.

[[high 5]]

name: halnewcome
text: this is one of the funniest things i have ever read. just, like, top ten.  profoundly, dynamic-redifiningly funny.  Comedy for me is different now.  I'm frankly a little scared of a world where I know about Tight Math, and its jocular ramifications.

name: belgand
text:
My girlfriend would not recognize a box from Tiffany and would further probably not care at all that it was from there even if it was real.

I do not know whether this is a good thing or a bad thing.

name: greenkoolayd
text: a] tight math=multiplication.  [[winkwinknudgenudge]]

name: kaithekender
text: Oh man wanna-bling is totally my new favourite phrase that I will use for a few days then stop when it becomes apparent that nobody I know thinks it is as funny as I do.

name: mtrott
text: It is offensive to even suggest that Molly Sanders is in the same league as hoochie mamas and sluts who would appropriate a dresser drawer as a vessel for an infant. I would think the same Miss Lady who reads Wired and likes to code for fun couldn't care less for a shiny, jingly bracelet or some shit.
